ComicInfo.Title: Serpent's Tale Part Two: The Nest
ComicInfo.Summary:
Arise, Serpentor... ARISE! In our last issue, you met the charismatic, fearsome, magnetic cult leader known as Serpentor. Now learn how he came to be what he is today... both the fantastic story his followers subscribe to, and the not-quite-as-godlike, yet no less terrifying, truth. The critically acclaimed series delivers its boldest, most shocking story yet!
Serpentor brainwashes a reporter to bring him into The Coil!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:17:19. [CVDB248454]
ComicInfo.Characters: Albert Einstein, Attila the Hun, Charles Manson, Golobulus, Hawk, Leonardo Da Vinci, Napoleon Bonaparte, Scoop, Serpentor
